title: The Full Investigation
description: You've received an anonymous tip about a suspicious domain: ' https://kmcc-uk.org/'. Step 1: Use WHOIS to nd the registrar name. Step 2: Use DNS lookup to nd the rst A record ( rst IPv4 address). Step 3: Use IP geolocation to nd the country code. Combine them in format: REGISTRAR_IP_COUNTRY (all uppercase, use first word of registrar only).
hints: Break this into three separate lookups: WHOIS, DNS, and IP geolocation.
Use the tools from previous challenges to solve each step.
